text: wlw 'anana ajbna talab hwla', fnzzalna 'iilayhim almalayikat min alsma', wa'ahyayna lahum almwta, fklmwhm, wjmena lahum kula shay' tlbwh feaynwh mwajht, lm ysddiqu bima daeawtuhum 'iilayh -ayha alrswl- walam yaemaluu bh, 'iilaa man sha' allah lah alhdayt, wlkn 'akthar hwla' alkufaar yajhalun alhaqi aladhi jit bih min eind allah teala
